scenario.title: Multi-OS Network Discovery Lab
scenario.description: A comprehensive network reconnaissance environment featuring diverse operating systems and services. Practice nmap's full capabilities including OS detection, service enumeration, timing attacks, and evasion techniques across legacy Unix, Windows domain infrastructure, embedded IoT devices, and stealth honeypot systems.
stages: Initial network discovery and host enumeration using ping sweeps and ARP scans
Port scanning with different techniques (-sS, -sT, -sU, -sA) across all target systems
Operating system fingerprinting and service version detection on diverse platforms
Advanced timing and evasion techniques against the stealth honeypot system
Comprehensive service enumeration including SMB shares, SNMP communities, and custom protocols
